title: Understand Why Chatbots Matter to the Contact Center
summary: Chatbots have evolved beyond scripts into intelligent agents using natural language understanding. This unit covers how AI chatbots transform call centers by managing routine inquiries, improving efficiency, and handing off complex issues to human agents.

questions.question: What makes generative AI fundamentally different from predictive AI?

choices.B: It creates new, original content rather than analyzing existing trends

questions.question: Why is accuracy a concern in generative AI?

choices.A: AI models can’t process written text
choices.B: Users might assume the output is factually correct even when it’s not
choices.C: All AI is programmed to be inaccurate
choices.D: It always pulls data from a live web feed
